sense.def:
To trace something
pomeni nekaj iskati in na koncu najti.

seg.quote: They were trying to trace her missing husband.

sense.def:
To trace the development of something
pomeni ugotoviti ali opisati, kako je potekal razvoj nečesa.

seg.quote: ...attempting to trace the evolution of man.

sense.def:
To trace a drawing or map
pomeni položiti prozoren papir na sliko ali zemljevid in vleči svinčnik po črtah, ki se vidijo skozi papir.

A trace
je znak, ki kaže, da je nekdo ali nekaj bilo na določenem kraju.

seg.quote: No trace was found of either the bag or its contents.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo izgine
without trace
, ni nobenega znaka, po katerem bi lahko sklepali, kam je odšel.

A trace of something
je zelo majhna količina nečesa.
